answers.author: Douglas Schulze
answers.text:
We went through a community visioning process last summer and received excellent input from the community. Our final report can be found on the City of Normandy Park website under General City Documents in the document library or at:  http://npsightlines2030.files.wordpress.com/2009/09/sightlines2030_final-report.pdf
Good luck with your project.

answers.author: Ken  Hirsch
answers.text:
I am an architect in Boca Raton FL and have been involved in community visioning for the last 20 years. Before I could give you some direction, I would have to know more about the community situation. 
1. Do you have a budget?
2. What is the population of your community?
3. What is the geographic area to be included in the visioning process?
4. How many days do you expect the citizens to participate in the process?
5. Do you have a steering committee established?
You can contact me at khirsch@hirscharchitects.com

author: Lloyd Harrell
text: I am assisting a community in AZ which is attempting to design a community visioning project.  Has anyone had experience with a similar project?  I am looking for a description of the project including successes, budget and process.  Thanks for the assistance...
title: Communitywide Visioning Project
